languages.text: {n}С головы каждого сервитора удалены все волосы, и массивные церебральные аугменты накрывают их черепа, словно шлемы. Лица слуг {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатора{/g} пусты, глаза закрыты, а губы непрерывно шепчут какую-то бессмыслицу. По вид-скрину когитатора бегут сотни строк символов, хранящих в себе информацию. Авель Ханейманн взирает на него с жадным интересом, резко контрастирующим с обычным его спокойствием.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}С головы каждого сервитора удалены все волосы, и массивные церебральные аугменты накрывают их черепа, словно шлемы. Лица слуг {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатора{/g} пусты, глаза закрыты, а губы непрерывно шепчут какую-то бессмыслицу. По вид-скрину когитатора бегут сотни строк символов, хранящих в себе информацию. Авель Ханейманн взирает на него с жадным интересом, резко контрастирующим с обычным его спокойствием.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The hair has been removed from the servitors' heads. Their bulky cerebral augmetics cover their skulls like helmets. The faces of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}'s servants are blank. Their eyes are closed. Their lips are incessantly whispering what sounds like gibberish. Hundreds of lines of symbols containing information scroll down the cogitator's vid-screen. Abel Haneumann peers at it with voracious interest, in sharp contrast to his usual placidity.{/n}

Лица слуг {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатора{/g} пусты, глаза закрыты, а губы непрерывно шепчут какую-то бессмыслицу. По вид-скрину когитатора бегут сотни строк символов, хранящих в себе информацию. Авель Ханейманн взирает на него с жадным интересом, резко контрастирующим с обычным его спокойствием.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hair has been removed from every servitor's head. Their bulky cerebral augmetics cover their skulls like helmets. The faces of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}'s servants are blank. Their eyes are closed. Their lips are incessantly whispering what sounds like gibberish. Hundreds of lines of symbols containing preserved information are scrolling down the cogitator's vid-screen. Abel Haneumann is peering at it with voracious interest, in a sharp contrast to his usual calmness.{/n}

languages.text: {n}髪が全てのサーヴィターから取り除かれた。彼らの存在感ある脳のオーグメティックがヘルメットのように頭蓋を覆っている。{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}の従者の顔には何も浮かんでいなかった。彼らの目は閉じられており、唇はでたらめのように聞こえる何かをひっきりなしに囁いている。情報を含んだ何百というシンボルが考算機のスクリーンを流れ落ちていっている。アベル・ヘニュマンはそれを、普段の彼の物静かさとはうってかわって対照的に、貪欲なまでの関心をもってじっと見ていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hair has been removed from the servitors' heads. Their bulky cerebral augmetics cover their skulls like helmets. The faces of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}'s servants are blank. Their eyes are closed. Their lips are incessantly whispering what sounds like gibberish. Hundreds of lines of symbols containing information scroll down the cogitator's vid-screen. Abel Haneumann peers at it with voracious interest, in sharp contrast to his usual placidity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}髪が全てのサーヴィターから取り除かれた。彼らの存在感ある脳のオーグメティックがヘルメットのように頭蓋を覆っている。{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}の従者の顔には何も浮かんでいなかった。彼らの目は閉じられており、唇はでたらめのように聞こえる何かをひっきりなしに囁いている。情報を含んだ何百というシンボルが考算機のスクリーンを流れ落ちていっている。アベル・ヘニュマンはそれを、普段の彼の物静かさとはうってかわって対照的に、貪欲なまでの関心をもってじっと見ていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}每个机仆的头发都掉光了，它们笨重的大脑植入物就像头盔一样覆在头骨上。{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}的仆人面无表情，所有人都闭着眼睛，嘴唇不断地低声说着什么，听起来像是毫无意义的胡言乱语。几百行包含信息的文字在沉思者的视讯屏幕平不断滚动。亚伯·哈努曼正饶有兴趣地凝视着屏幕，与他平时安静的状态形成了鲜明对比。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hair has been removed from the servitors' heads. Their bulky cerebral augmetics cover their skulls like helmets. The faces of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}'s servants are blank. Their eyes are closed. Their lips are incessantly whispering what sounds like gibberish. Hundreds of lines of symbols containing information scroll down the cogitator's vid-screen. Abel Haneumann peers at it with voracious interest, in sharp contrast to his usual placidity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}每个奴工的头发都掉光了，它们笨重的大脑植入物就像头盔一样覆在头骨上。{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}的仆人面无表情，所有人都闭着眼睛，嘴唇不断地低声说着什么，听起来像是毫无意义的胡言乱语。几百行包含信息的文字在思考器的视讯屏幕平不断滚动。亚伯·哈努曼正饶有兴趣地凝视着屏幕，与他平时安静的状态形成了鲜明对比。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Haare wurden von den Köpfen der Servitoren entfernt. Ihre klobigen zerebralen Augmentationen bedecken ihre Schädel wie Helme. Die Gesichter der Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitators{/g} sind ausdruckslos. Ihre Augen sind geschlossen. Ihre Lippe flüstern unaufhörlich, das sich anhört wie sinnloses Gebrabbel. Hunderte Zeilen mit Symbolen, die gespeicherte Informationen enthalten, scrollen auf dem Vid-Bildschirm des Cogitators nach unten. Abel Haneumann starrt mit gierigem Interesse darauf, was seiner sonstigen Ruhe komplett widerspricht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hair has been removed from the servitors' heads. Their bulky cerebral augmetics cover their skulls like helmets. The faces of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}'s servants are blank. Their eyes are closed. Their lips are incessantly whispering what sounds like gibberish. Hundreds of lines of symbols containing information scroll down the cogitator's vid-screen. Abel Haneumann peers at it with voracious interest, in sharp contrast to his usual placidity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vom Kopf aller Servitoren wurden die Haare entfernt. Ihre klobigen zerebralen Augmentationen bedecken ihre Schädel wie Helme. Die Gesichter der Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitators{/g} sind ausdruckslos. Ihre Augen sind geschlossen. Ihre Lippe flüstern unaufhörlich, das sich anhört wie sinnloses Gebrabbel. Hunderte Zeilen mit Symbolen, die gespeicherte Informationen enthalten, scrollen auf dem Vid-Bildschirm des Cogitators nach unten. Abel Haneumann starrt darauf mit gierigem Interesse, was seiner sonstigen Ruhe komplett widerspricht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tous les servitors ont le crâne rasé. Leurs volumineux augmétiques cérébraux leur recouvrent la tête à la manière d'un casque. Les visages des serviteurs du {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} sont inexpressifs et ils ont les yeux fermés. De leurs lèvres s'échappent des murmures continus dont le sens vous échappe. Des centaines de lignes de symboles contenant des informations préalablement consignées défilent sur l'écran du cogitateur. Abel Haneumann les scrute avec un intérêt vorace en net contraste avec son flegme habituel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hair has been removed from the servitors' heads. Their bulky cerebral augmetics cover their skulls like helmets. The faces of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}'s servants are blank. Their eyes are closed. Their lips are incessantly whispering what sounds like gibberish. Hundreds of lines of symbols containing information scroll down the cogitator's vid-screen. Abel Haneumann peers at it with voracious interest, in sharp contrast to his usual placidity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tous les servitors ont le crâne rasé. Leurs volumineux augmétiques cérébraux leur recouvrent la tête à la manière d'un casque. Les visages des serviteurs du {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} sont inexpressifs et ils ont les yeux fermés. De leurs lèvres s'échappent des murmures continus dont le sens vous échappe. Des centaines de lignes de symboles contenant des informations préalablement consignées défilent sur l'écran du cogitateur. Abel Haneumann les scrute avec un intérêt vorace en net contraste avec son flegme habituel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El cabello se ha extirpado de las cabezas de los servidores. Sus voluminosos implantes auméticos cerebrales les cubren el cráneo como si fueran cascos. Los siervos del {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} miran con expresión vacía. Tienen los ojos cerrados. Sus labios murmuran constantemente lo que parece un galimatías. Centenares de líneas de símbolos con información se desplazan hacia abajo en la videopantalla del cogitador. Abel Haneumann los escudriña con un interés voraz, en marcado contraste con su habitual templanza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hair has been removed from the servitors' heads. Their bulky cerebral augmetics cover their skulls like helmets. The faces of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}'s servants are blank. Their eyes are closed. Their lips are incessantly whispering what sounds like gibberish. Hundreds of lines of symbols containing information scroll down the cogitator's vid-screen. Abel Haneumann peers at it with voracious interest, in sharp contrast to his usual placidity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cabello se ha extirpado de las cabezas de todos los servidores. Sus voluminosos implantes auméticos cerebrales les cubren el cráneo como si fueran cascos. Los siervos del {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} miran con expresión vacía. Tienen los ojos cerrados. Sus labios murmuran constantemente lo que parece un galimatías. Centenares de líneas de símbolos que contienen información preservada se desplazan hacia abajo en la videopantalla del cogitador. Abel Haneumann los escudriña con un interés voraz, en marcado contraste con su habitual templanza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hizmetörlerin başlarındaki saç alınmış. İri beyin ogmetikleri, kafalarını bir kask gibi kaplıyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Kavramsayarın{/g} hizmetkârlarının yüzleri ifadesiz. Gözleri kapalı. Dudakları durmaksızın, anlamsız görünen bir şeyler fısıldıyor. Kavramsayarın video ekranında, bilgi taşıyan sembollerden oluşan yüzlerce satır kayıyor. Abel Haneumann; genel sükunetine tezat oluşturan, muazzam bir ilgiyle ekranı izliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hair has been removed from the servitors' heads. Their bulky cerebral augmetics cover their skulls like helmets. The faces of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}'s servants are blank. Their eyes are closed. Their lips are incessantly whispering what sounds like gibberish. Hundreds of lines of symbols containing information scroll down the cogitator's vid-screen. Abel Haneumann peers at it with voracious interest, in sharp contrast to his usual placidity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hizmetörlerin başlarındaki saç alınmış. İri beyin ogmetikleri kafalarını bir kask gibi kaplıyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Kavramsayar{/g}ın hizmetkârlarının yüzleri ifadesiz. Gözleri kapalı. Dudakları durmaksızın anlamsız görünen bir şeyler fısıldıyor. Kavramsayarın video ekranında, bilgi taşıyan sembollerden oluşan yüzlerce satır kayıyor. Abel Haneumann onu, genel sükunetiyle tezat oluşturacak şekilde, muazzam bir ilgiyle izliyor.{/n}
